bomberman.core
Class BomberMan

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.Game.Default
      bomberman.core.BomberMan
All Implemented Interfaces:
playn.core.Game, playn.core.Keyboard.Listener, playn.core.Pointer.Listener
public class BomberMan
extends playn.core.Game.Default
implements playn.core.Keyboard.Listener, playn.core.Pointer.Listener

The class responsible for maintaining the core game loop and all other components of the Bomberman game. This class maintains references to each of the individual gameplay mechanics and serves as a call through for changing the state of the game (e.g., switching from the start UIScreen to a new round of the game). Importantly, this class serves as the primary entry point for all timing-based updates and graphics refreshes to the game and then delegates the updates to the appropriate UIScreen based on the current state of the game.

See Also:
StartScreen, DecoratedWorld, UIScreen
